mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NUM>0 AND TITLE LIKE '%3%' ORDER BY NUM DESC) N) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET HIT = HIT+1 WHERE NUM = #{num}
